Comment 1: 
I have also experienced a segfault while working on a highly concurrent program that
open thousands of unix sockets. I can't really reproduce it reliably and the code is not
open, but it was on linux/amd64, GOMAXPROCS=8 and the backtrace is the same as reported
by fullung.

Sometimes, instead of the segfault, I would get
"runtime: signal received on thread not created by Go."
although my program is pure Go (but the Go tree has CGO_ENABLED).
